First introduced in 1997, this lightly-peated single malt whisky is aged for at least 18 years in a combination of former sherry casks made of European and American oak.

The sweet smoke is the underlying feature in this whisky but the complexity of the dram is what is most enjoyable. Among the many notes found were oyster mushrooms, fresh cut apples, kelp, cigar ash, honey, sea salt, and smoked bacon.
Stephanie Moreno

Rich & Fruity
